title: Vertex Color Painting
focus: All paint tools implemented and tested

criteria.text: Brush paints vertex colors with falloff
criteria.notes: paint_brush() with radius/opacity/hardness falloff, 14 tests pass

criteria.text: Fill tool floods connected region with color
criteria.notes: flood_fill() with BFS on triangle adjacency, pre-cached colors for correctness

criteria.text: Gradient tool applies color gradient across selection
criteria.notes: apply_gradient() projects vertices onto start-end line, lerps between two colors
eyedropper() finds nearest vertex, copies color to palette with HSV sync

checklist.item: Implement brush painting with falloff radius
Implement fill tool for flood-filling regions
Implement gradient tool across vertex selections
Define PaintTool enum for tool selection

worker_notes: All 4 paint tools implemented in paint.rs. PaintSystem integrates into AssetEditor as Stage 4 (Color). ColorPalette has Trees/Rock/Wood presets, recent colors (max 8), HSV sync. All 14 unit tests pass. Both battle_editor and battle_arena compile cleanly.

notes_history.note: Implemented all paint tools, fixed flood fill to pre-cache colors, fixed brush test assertions. All 14 tests pass, both binaries compile.

iteration_history.action: Created paint.rs with PaintSystem, BrushParams, ColorPalette, PaintTool. Implemented brush, fill, gradient, eyedropper. Wired into mod.rs. Fixed tests and committed.
iteration_history.notes: All criteria met in single iteration

learnings: Flood fill BFS must pre-cache triangle colors before painting to avoid corrupting neighbor color checks
When testing brush painting, avoid painting a color onto a background that already has that channel maxed (e.g. red onto white)
